nodes.text: Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures: Heroes & Villains

Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures: Heroes & Villains is a Level 2 World of Reading young-readers reference title based on the animated micro-series Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on September 17, 2019.
Meet the characters from the beloved Star Wars saga! Featuring easy-to-read text and colorful artwork, this illustrated primer with stickers is ideal for young fans learning to read.
